title: Melinda French Gates - The Giving Pledge

time_markers.text: more than 25 years into this work
quotes: And more than 25 years into this work, I feel that my debt to life—and my debt to humanity—has only grown.

organizations.name: Pivotal Ventures
quotes: Pivotal Ventures partnership with Wellcome Leap will further research in critically underfunded areas in women’s health.

organizations.name: Wellcome Leap
quotes: Pivotal Ventures partnership with Wellcome Leap will further research in critically underfunded areas in women’s health.

organizations.name: Giving Pledge
quotes: Explore the Giving Pledge community’s learning and impact
including Giving Pledge signatories Sara Blakely, Tsitsi Masiyiwa, Cari Tuna, and Anne Wojcicki

roles.title: Philanthropist
quotes: Philanthropists are generally more helpful to the world when we’re standing behind a movement rather than trying to lead our own.
Engaging in philanthropy has been one of the most rewarding experiences of my time on this planet.
